comments.body: The reason I put this in `browserIntegrationTest.js` is so it would work locally without extra magic steps, but if you donâ€™t care about running locally (I guess nobody would really want to do that), this is fine

diffHunk:

      run: npm install --no-save --no-package-lock playwright

    - name: Validate the browser can import TypeScript

comments.body: I'm _pretty sure_ we can remove this from our scripts, since we don't use `tslint` anymore, XD

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +30,34 @@      run: |
        npm uninstall typescript --no-save
        npm uninstall tslint --no-save
    - name: npm install and test
      run: |
